vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ACCURAL_DEPOSIT.collect (patch_7.sol#31-37):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_7.sol#33-36)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_7.sol#34)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: newMessage in LogFile.addMessage (patch_7.sol#56) is a local variable never initialiazed
